directly_predict_desc.content:
Task:
As an expert in medical coding and diagnosis, you are tasked with reviewing the following clinical record. Your goal is to identify and summarize the correct ICD-10 codes that correspond to the diagnoses and conditions mentioned in the text. Ensure accuracy and relevancy in your coding, and follow the format of the example completely.

Example Response:
<icd>{"code": "I21.9", "description": "Acute myocardial infarction, unspecified"}</icd>
<icd>{"code": "E11.9", "description": "Type 2 diabetes mellitus without complications"}</icd>
<icd>{"code": "R07.9", "description": "Chest pain, unspecified"}</icd>
<icd>{"code": "R06.02", "description": "Shortness of breath"}</icd>

Clinical Record:
{text}

Response:
{previous_results}

[Target]
Check if the results in response are correct. If correct, repeat the response, if not, output the correct results in the same format.
